NamedNodeMapGetNamedItem.summary: The getNamedItem() method of the interface returns the corresponding to the given name, or null if there is no corresponding attribute.

blockquote.para:
Note: This method is also called when you use the operator [] syntax.
So, myMap[str]is equivalent to myMap.getNamedItem(str) where str is a string.

NamedNodeMapGetNamedItem.returns: An corresponding to the name given in parameter, or null if none has been found.
